Package org.openmuc.jdlms.client.hdlc.common

Class Summary
FcsCalc This class is used to compute a Frame Check Sequence according to IEC 62056-46 annex A.
FrameRejectReason Class representing the information field of a FrameReject response frame For more information, see ISO 13239 section 5.5.3.4.2
HdlcAddressPair Bundle of client and server address that uniquely identifies an Hdlc Client connection.
HdlcFrame This class represents a complete HDLC frame ready to be sent, excluding opening and closing flag
HdlcHeaderParser This class parses the header of incoming HDLC frames for source and destination addresses and checks the frame of integrity using the transmitted HCS and FCS.
HdlcParameterNegotiation This class represents optional parameter that are negotiated during the connection phase between client and server on the HDLC layer.
 

Enum Summary
FrameType Collection of bit patterns that define the frame type from a control byte
 

Exception Summary
FrameInvalidException This exception is thrown if the HdlcHeaderParser class parses an invalid HDLC frame
